Text.Page:
Orders just came down to clear the arachnen painweavers from the Labyrinth of Terror.

Great, but I'm not sending one of the four of us in there.

You have the gear for it, right?

Hey, sorry to put you up to that. I just can't handle arachnens.

It's all those legs, with the bristly little hairs on them. Eeeugh!
